v1.0.0.description:
### New Features

- Portalsanity! (Level Doors and Stars are Checks)
- Alternate win conditions added:
  - Crystal Turn-In Count: Turn in the number of Crystals to win, ranging from 2-7
  - Golden Garibs: Find the golden garibs in the multiworld to win
- Checkpoint Items
- Custom Mr. Tip Dialogue
- Score Locations
- Open World/Open Level Settings
- Random Garib Sounds
- False Trap Names
- Easy Ball Walk (De-Inverts your ball controls when standing atop it)
- Filler Items and Trap Items work by weight instead of by percentage
- Overrides to manually set your spawning Checkpoint, the level Entrances, and the Garib Order
- APWorld interactivity with False Trap Names and Custom Mr. Tip Dialogue
- Entrance Randomizer locations now display the Hub Door as its Entrance
- Debug option to toggle puml generation for Glover Logic Builders

### Fixes

- Fixed uncaught set_rule lambda error breaking checkpoint spawns (Thank you [CodeGorilla](https://www.twitch.tv/codegorilla) and the people from AP's discord world-dev chat!)
- Fixed Bonus Levels causing Spawning Checkpoint Randomizer logic breaks
- Made Switch-requiring access rules happen after switchless access rules
- Fixed Switchsanity disabling making some switches unusable as vanilla
- Fixed the Fear Boss Reset Switch not working with Switch Checks enabled
- Fear 1's Targets not working with Switch Checks enabled
- Fixed not making you tag after death/checkpoint menu warps
- Fixed the multiworld using random items when needing to place filler items in the world
- Marked an extra life in Fortress of Fear 2 thought inaccessible as accessible (Brick Life)
- Fix the floating ram level transition into instant-check bug.
- Prevents Glover crashing when 100 messages were sent in the same level.
- Stop cutscenes from crashing when receiving filler items by adjusting the cutscene notification flag
- Fixed Level Garibs not giving star marks
- Fixed Level Garibs causing Extra Lives to give garibs
- Fixed item received text sometimes falling behind the current items
- Fixed graphical errors with text displaying garibs/lives when message ram got too full
- Fixed the custom tip crashes.
- Atl1's General Wu's no longer dies when being pushed down the beach
- Crn3's Bee flying too low no longer kills them
- Fixed validation of text for Lua tip inputs
- Fixed Wayroom Tips not being written
- Fixed collecting a checkpoint without having the item replacing the current menu option with the given checkpoint
- Fixed text being on screen while loading a checkpoint crashing
- Fixed collecting the first checkpoint of a level instantly making you respawn
- Fixed Garib collection sfx on garib settings that are not by level
- Fixed getting boomerang/beachball potion in hubs killing you repeatedly
- Fixed being able to enter and leave the well to duplicate balls in the hubworld
- Fixed Game Overs causing a game crash.
- Fixed hint scouts not generating with tip checks disabled
- Fist-Slamming the platform in Pirates 2 moves it while Switch Checks are enabled
- Exiting/Entering the hub after leaving a level caused Xandervile's random door openings
- Fixed Locate Garibs locking your ability to cast spells, and clearing when traps clear.
- Fixed Portalsanity opening a gate before the gate you meant to get
- Fixed getting all garibs in a level giving you a star mark without the item in Portalsanity
- Fixed Level Spawn-In Crashes
- Fixed Score Names not showing up in Locations List
- Fixed All Garib Names not showing up in Locations List
- Fixed All Garib checks being placed at level root and thus requiring level access logically
- Fixed 20 character lines breaking everything.
- Fixed TrapLink not checking if your currently sending a trap before sending it.
- Fixed TrapLink not getting a trap because it wasn't looking for the trap name in the data.
- Fixed checkpoints not accounting for touching the ball letting you warp to the checkpoint with it after
- Fixed cheats happening during the main menu/demo and crashing Glover
- Fixed bug that makes message text fall behind when getting FoF Bonus Garibs or other similarly long multi-message notifications that split into a second message

### Known Bugs
- Somehow, later levels will open randomly when Open Levels and Portalsanity are off. I've spend 3 months trying to track down this bug, and so I'm just leaving it be.
- "Link" packets are occasionally asymmetrical

The following are known, but I want to keep because they're just kinda funny.
- You're able to get atop the ball in bonus levels where you control only the ball.
- Getting a frog trap as a stage completion item occurs creates a terrible Glover-Frog hybrid.

### No Current Plans

- Tip Trap
- Fastcam
- Grab Mechanical Implementation (Depreciated & Autocollects for logic pathing)



Many thanks to [jjjj112212](https://github.com/jjjj12212) for help with the creation of the Glover AP Rom. He's retired from working on this project, and I wish him the best in future
